pageContent: Enhanced survival and therapeutic choices for men with prostate cancer mandate the evaluation of the "quality of survival". An exciting series of local, national and international health outcome improvement initiatives offer the enticing prospect of assessing and improving this.

metaData.source:
Psychosocial consequences of potential overdiagnosis in prostate cancer a qualitative interview study
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33241957/
